questions.question: What is the first step in preparing data for machine learning?

explanations.b: Correct! Preprocessing is the first step before training a model.
explanations.c: Predictions come after training the model.
explanations.d: Deployment is the final step, not the first.

questions.question: Which type of data is commonly processed before machine learning?

explanations.a: Text data needs preprocessing, but it's not the only type.
explanations.b: Numerical data also requires cleaning and scaling.
explanations.c: Image data often requires resizing and normalization.
explanations.d: Correct! Different types of data require preprocessing before ML.

answers.a: To make the data easier for machines to understand
answers.b: To make machine learning models perfect
answers.c: To remove all errors from the dataset

explanations.a: Correct! Preprocessing ensures data is in a structured format suitable for ML models.
explanations.b: ML models cannot be perfect; preprocessing helps improve accuracy.
explanations.c: Preprocessing reduces errors but may not remove all of them.
explanations.d: Preprocessing does not generate new data; it improves existing data.
